line_1: Was ae day nibbling on the tether,
line_2: AS MAILIE, an' her lambs thegither,

line_1: An' bid him burn this cursed tether,
line_2: An' for thy pains thou'se get my blather.

line_1: May Envy wallop in a tether,
May Envy wallop in a tether,
line_2: We've been owre lang unkenn'd to ither:

line_1: May Envy wallop in a tether,
line_2: Now let us lay our heads thegither,

line_1: An' gies them't, like a tether,
line_2: Frae side to side they bother,

line_1: Wi' tentie care I'll slit thy tether,
line_2: We've worn to crazy years thegither;

line_1: Wi' tentie care I'll slit thy tether,
line_2: We'll toyte about wi' ane anither;

line_1: Wi' tentie care I'll slit thy tether,
line_2: Whare ye may nobly rax your leather,
